PinWidget

A widget class that you can include on shift or space to allow for pinning functionality.  The PinWidget class assumes that your delegate object has the following properties as methods.

getPinRefreturns the pin reference object associated with the delegate.
getPinWidgetButton()returns a DOM node.
getPinWidgetAllowedActions()returns an array of desired actions: before, after, replace, relative.
onPin()a pinEvent handler.
isPinnedwhether the delegate is pinned or not.
Summary
PinWidgetA widget class that you can include on shift or space to allow for pinning functionality.
Functions
initializeTakes an element that will represents the pin widget button and a callback function.
delegateWasPinned (private)Called when the delegate fires a pin event.
delegateWasUnpinned (private)Called when the delegate fires a unpin event.
createMenu (private)Creates the pinning selection menu.
setMenuItems (private)Sets the pin widgets menu items based on the allowed actions specified by the delegate.
updateMenu (private)Refresh the pin selection menu.
toggleSelection (private)Toggles the pin selection mode.
showMenu (private)Shows the pin selection options menu.
hideMenu (private)Hides the pin selectin option menu.
userPinnedElement (private)User pinned the element.
setPinnedElement (private)Sets an internal reference to a pinned element.
getPinnedElement (private)Returns the pinned element.
userSelectedPinAction (private)Event handler that called when the user selects an option from the pin selection option menu.
refresh (private)Called the refresh the appearance of the pin widget.

Functions

initialize

initialize: function(delegate)

Takes an element that will represents the pin widget button and a callback function.  The callback will be made when the user has pinned a node on the page.  The element should be an appropriate tag with the the dimensions 19px x 19px.

Parameters

delegatethe delegate of this PinWidget.  Normally this either a ShiftSpace.Space instance or a ShiftSpace.Shift instance.  In either case the delegate should implement all of the methods defined in the PinWidget delegate protocol defined above.

delegateWasPinned (private)

delegateWasPinned: function()

Called when the delegate fires a pin event.

delegateWasUnpinned (private)

delegateWasUnpinned: function()

Called when the delegate fires a unpin event.

createMenu (private)

createMenu: function()

Creates the pinning selection menu.

setMenuItems (private)

setMenuItems: function()

Sets the pin widgets menu items based on the allowed actions specified by the delegate.

updateMenu (private)

updateMenu: function(action)

Refresh the pin selection menu.

toggleSelection (private)

toggleSelection: function(_evt)

Toggles the pin selection mode.  There are three, a) node selection mode, b) menu selection mode, c) pinned mode.

Parameters

_evta DOM event.

showMenu (private)

showMenu: function(_evt)

Shows the pin selection options menu.

Parameters

_evta DOM event.

hideMenu (private)

hideMenu: function(_evt)

Hides the pin selectin option menu.

Parameters

_evta DOM event.

userPinnedElement (private)

userPinnedElement: function(element)

User pinned the element.  This should never be called directly, ShiftSpace Core handles this.  Implicity show the pin selection option menu.

Parameters

elementa DOM node.

setPinnedElement (private)

setPinnedElement: function(element)

Sets an internal reference to a pinned element.

Parameters

elementa DOM node.

getPinnedElement (private)

getPinnedElement: function(element)

Returns the pinned element.  You should not call this directly.

Parameters

elementa DOM node.

userSelectedPinAction (private)

userSelectedPinAction: function(_evt)

Event handler that called when the user selects an option from the pin selection option menu.

Parameters

_evta DOM event.

refresh (private)

refresh: function()

Called the refresh the appearance of the pin widget.
